about.line1: I am a versatile person with experience in various fields. But when it comes to my passion, it is development.
about.line2: My experience in development, combined with my natural skills and strong interest, makes me a qualified candidate for development-related jobs. I am self-driven and like to work both in teams and individually, with the ability to take initiative and deliver results.
about.line3: I speak fluent Arabic, speak Swedish nearly fluently and have good command of English., which gives me an advantage when it comes to communicating effectively.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer – Ongoing
frontend.frontendTech: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, shadcn, TanStack Query
frontend.backendTech: Express.js, SQL, C#, Web API, Entity Framework Core

items.itSupport: IT support and IT management within M365
items.sharepoint: SharePoint Online and SharePoint Admin Center
items.powerPlatform: Power Platform (Power Automate, Power Apps, Power Virtual Agent, Power Pages, Power BI)

microsoft365Old.title: Microsoft 365 – Previous version
microsoft365Old.description: A course in the older version of Microsoft 365.

personalLetter.title: About Me
personalLetter.paragraph2: I am person who enjoys learning new things, especially within web development. I have skills in both frontend and backend, and I find it exciting to create user-friendly and functional websites.
personalLetter.paragraph3: I also have experience with Microsoft 365, which gives me a broader understanding of modern IT solutions and tools.
personalLetter.paragraph4: I like working both independently and with others. I am driven, take initiative, and always strive to do my best in everything I do.
personalLetter.paragraph5: My ambition is to continue growing as a developer and contribute positively with my skills.
personalLetter.paragraph6: Thank you for taking the time to read my letter. I look forward to the opportunity to show what I can contribute and to grow together with you.

frontend.title: Frontend Developer
frontend.description: I have solid knowledge of the following technologies:
items: API-integrationer med REST, JSON, Axios, Fetch

m365.title: Microsoft 365
m365.description: Within Microsoft 365, I have experience with:
items: Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, Power Virtual Agents)
Office Online (Word, Excel, PowerPoint online) – Web versions of Office apps

items.description: Responsible for providing care, support, and services to elderly people in their homes. Worked with personal care, medication handling, and social support.
Supported students in different subjects, assisted in the classroom, and helped create a positive and supportive learning environment.
Worked on creating and editing SharePoint pages and supported Power Platform solutions like Power Apps and Power Automate.
Worked with assembling truck parts, especially doors. Assembled complete units with precision and attention to detail.
Cleaned hotel rooms and common areas thoroughly.

items.example: Nybro Municipality – home care and school
items.description: I worked in elderly home care and as a substitute teacher. I supported people in their daily routines and helped students in the classroom. I gained experience in service, responsibility, and teamwork.

items.example: Internship at Twoday – SharePoint and Power Platform
items.description: During my internship, I worked on creating and editing SharePoint pages. I also helped build solutions using Microsoft Power Apps and Power Automate. I gained hands-on experience with modern digital tools.
I worked in production at Scania, assembling truck parts – especially doors. The work required precision, teamwork, and strong work discipline.
I cleaned hotel rooms, making sure everything was tidy and welcoming. I learned the importance of attention to detail and good customer service.

items.example: Grocery store in Syria – sales assistant
items.description: I worked in a store selling products, helping customers, and keeping the shop organized. I gained experience in sales, responsibility, and customer care.
